title: Starbound 1.3.2 更新日志
author: zjjxs
txt_content:
Starbound 1.3.2 Changelog
Healthire posted on July 18th, 2017 in News, Patch Notes

Hello,
大家好，

Starbound has been updated with some minor gameplay changes and bug fixes. Everyone on Steam should see the update immediately, but those on GOG and Humble may need to wait a little while for the files to update.
Starbound进行了一次小小的更新。Steam用户马上就能升级到新版本，但GOG和Humble用户可能还需要等一下才能更新。

Check below for patch notes!
请在下面查看补丁说明！


ADDITIONS & CHANGES
更改
Reduce cost of player station parts
减少了私人空间站扩建的花费Show some system information on hovering over stars in the navigation interface
用鼠标停在星系上时在导航界面显示一些星系信息Show system name on the system screen in the navigation interface
在导航界面的星图上显示星系名称Properly beam away a player’s mech when a player beams off the world
当玩家离开星球时机甲会与玩家一起传送Deploying to asteroid fields puts you in a position related to where in the field your ship is
在部署到小行星带时你的位置与你飞船所处区域有关Allow any number of script panes with no source entity.
允许任意数量的无源实体的脚本窗格Add player.interact lua binding
添加了player.interact lua绑定Keep player from starving when in a mech
玩家在机甲中不会饥饿


BUG FIXES
Bug修复
Various NPC and Monster behavior fixes
NPC与怪物的行动修复Fix issue where player ships from other systems would be visible on the navigation screen
在导航屏幕上可以看到其它星系的玩家飞船的问题已解决Fix issue where deploying to a party member could result in deploying a mech to their ship
当传送到团队成员会导致在他们的飞船上部署机甲的问题已解决Improve jarring movement of the sky during flying and warping
改进了飞行和跃迁时天空的不规则运动Fix issue where inventory items would count twice in crafting interfaces
修复了在制造界面道具要点两次的问题Fix parameters argument for spawnnpc console command
修复了控制台spawnnpc命令参数Fix issue allowing the player to fly the ship before fully repairing it
玩家在未完全修复飞船就可飞行的问题已解决
